document_data.mainbody:
Joybell was a rock gnome cook living in Gnomengarde in the late 15 century DR.
Joybell operated the iron stove in Gnomengardes kitchen, keeping it hot by stoking it with a fire poker.
Like all the other gnomes in Gnomengarde, Joybell had some training as a wizard in addition to her innate abilities. In combat, she preferred to attack with spells like ray of frost and magic missile.
